about.summary: Implements the audit sampling workflow as discussed in Derks et al. (2019) <doi:10.31234/osf.io/9f6ub>. The package makes it easy for an auditor to plan a statistical sample, select the sample from the population, and evaluate the sample using various methods according to the International Standards on Auditing. Furthermore, the package implements Bayesian equivalents of these methods.

Implements the audit sampling workflow as discussed in Derks et al. (2019) <doi:10.31234/osf.io/9f6ub>. The package makes it easy for an auditor to plan a statistical sample, select the sample from the population, and evaluate the sample using various methods according to the International Standards on Auditing. Furthermore, the package implements Bayesian equivalents of these methods.

name: r-jfa
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.4" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-jfa
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/jfa_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/jfa/jfa_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8237a0d4dfb04a71696bd9123c6c173209a945aa91e9b602943027c8b22457cf

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-extradistr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-extradistr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('jfa')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('jfa')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://koenderks.github.io/jfa/, https://github.com/koenderks/jfa

  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Implements the audit sampling workflow as discussed in Derks et al. (2019) <doi:10.31234/osf.io/9f6ub>. The package makes it easy for an auditor to plan a statistical sample, select the sample from the population, and evaluate the sample using various methods according to the International Standards on Auditing.
    Furthermore, the package implements Bayesian equivalents of these methods.

  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
